segments.text: I have a bone to pick with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . Let ’ s clear the air . What are you getting at ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You always have a chip on your shoulder .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . But I don ’ t meant to get your goat .
segments.speaker: S2
